title: Radio 2 Live in Hyde Park headliners that blew us away
text:
Kylie has enough hits in her bag to wow a Hyde Park crowd with singalongs alone. But she wanted to make her 2018 Radio 2 Live in Hyde Park headline set extra memorable with the addition of two very special guests.

The first? A touching reunion with fellow Neighbours alum Jason Donovan. Yes, Scott and Charlene reunited like no time had passed at all (maybe their hairdos have changed just a little bit...) After a heartwarming waltz with Donovan, we were treated to a bonus Rick Astley cameo too. You can't really ask for more than that, can you?
description: From Kylie Minogue and Take That to Elton John and Rod Stewart.
